name: Top Notch Volcano

ingredients.name: 1 2 cup demerara simple syrup see note
2 tablespoons passion fruit pur√©e if frozen
aged south american or caribbean white rum

instructions: Combine all ingredients except spices in a pitcher. Stir with lots of ice until well chilled. Strain over fresh ice into a bowl.
Mix cinnamon and nutmeg in a salt shaker. Light a long wooden match and hold over bowl. Shake spices 3 or 4 times over flame. Ladle into 6- to 8-ounce cups.
